Service_name: Food Pantry (Elevate Life Church)
Description: Elevate Life Church provides a community Food Pantry. This program supplies critical nutrition to hungry individuals and families. This program provides:- Food to meet basic nutritional needs
Coverage: This program covers residents of the following cities: Riverside, CA.

Service_name: Food Bank (Lake Hills Christian Center)
Description: LHCC's Food Bank provides individuals with box of food for pick up. Individuals receive enough food to last almost an entire week.This program provides: - Food to meet nutritional needsParticipants must have a vehicle or cart to put your box and bags in. The Food Bank follows a first come first serve policy so please make sure to drive early.
Coverage: This program covers residents of the following cities: Riverside, CA.

Service_name: Blessing Bag of Food (Trinity Lutheran Church)
Description: Ziploc bags containing food and water are available at the church to be picked up and shared with homeless people in the community.This program provides:- Food bags
Coverage: This program covers residents of the following cities: Riverside, CA.

Service_name: Grocery and Clothing Assistance (Arlington Temporary Assistance)
Description: Arlington Temporary Assistance provides grocery and clothing assistance for individuals and families living in Riverside, CA.This program provides:- Food to meet nutritional needs- Clothing- Referrals to additional self-sufficiency servicesThese services are provided to members of the community free of charge. Contact the provider to learn more.
Coverage: This program covers residents of the following cities: Riverside, CA.

Service_name: Queen of Angels Food Pantry
Description: Queen of Angels offers a food pantry that is open to anyone in need. This program supports individuals and families with placing food on the table so they don't go without a meal.This program provides:- Food to meet basic nutritional needs
Coverage: This program covers residents of the following cities: Riverside, CA.

Service_name: Bright Path Center Emergency Food Assistance Program
Description: Bright Path Center's Emergency Food Assistance Program serves as a beacon of hope for those grappling with the risk of hunger and food insecurity.  This program provides:- Food pantry - Meals Those in need may contact Bright Path Center to schedule an appointment to pick up food. Those who do not have transportation may qualify for delivery service depending on location. Contact the provider for more information.
Coverage: This program covers residents of the following counties: Riverside County, CA and San Bernardino County, CA.

Service_name: Community Settlement Association Food Pantry Program
Description: CSA is continuing to provide services to the community through the food pantry program during the COVID-19 crisis. CSA remains committed to the families, seniors and individuals being assisted every week throughout the year and those affected by the COVID-19 situation. This program provides: - Food to meet basic nutritional needsNo pre-registration is required.
Coverage: This program covers residents of the following cities: Riverside, CA.

Service_name: Lutheran Social Services Southern California Food Pantry
Eligibility: ['This program serves those who are in the coverage area.']
Description: LSSSC's food pantries provide fresh and non-perishable food in cans/cartons, refrigerated meats, vegetables & dairy products to community members in need. This program provides: Food to meet basic nutritional needs. Each location's food pantry has individual operating hours. Please call ahead of time to verify available services.
Coverage: This program covers residents of the following counties: Los Angeles County, CA, Orange County, CA, Riverside County, CA, San Bernardino County, CA, San Diego County, CA and Ventura County, CA.

Service_name: R'Pantry
Main_Services: ['food pantry', 'baby supplies', 'home goods', 'personal care items', 'navigating the system']
Eligibility: ['This program serves undergraduate and graduate students of the University of California, Riverside.']
Description: R'Pantry provides emergency non-perishable food, personal hygiene, household care, and childcare items to both undergraduate and graduate students experiencing food insecurity. This program also connects Highlanders to on- and off-campus food resources and provide programs and workshops that improve health and wellness.This program provides:- Food to meet basic nutritional needs- Help accessing available local resourcesIndividuals can check their Facebook or Instagram for current program details. Appointments are mandatory. One Appointment is allowed per student, weekly. Need appointments on Monday and Friday, but not Tuesday and Thursday. If multiple appointments are made by the same individual, all appointments belonging to the individual will be canceled for the week.
Coverage: This program covers residents of the following cities: Riverside, CA.

Service_name: RCC Basic Needs Food Pantry
Eligibility: ['Must be a student currently enrolled in Riverside City College.']
Description: The Basic Needs Resource Center (BNRC) is available to all RCC students in need and aims to help supplement basic needs and promote sustainability for overall student wellness and success. BNRC provides provides quality food items to students experiencing food insecurity.This program provides:- Food to meet basic nutritional needsStudents can visit the pantry for a bag of food and personal items once every 2 weeks. If they demonstrate more need, they may be able to visit more often.Note hours may be impacted by food inventory or deliver. Please see the posted weekly schedule on the door for updates.
